reviews: Overall the head phones are good. I’m very picky about getting a good deep bass sound. Even when Adjusted EQ I wasn’t happy.  I’m a musician and a bass player. They were easy to operate and connect to my phone and tablet.

The sound on this is very tinny, even when I've played around with the EQ quite a bit.
The base is almost non-existent.
I've turned the noise cancelling on and off and can't really tell any difference
